title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan2 - What You Didn't Hear About Amy's Singing Days (Week of 2/25)
itunes:title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan2 - What You Didn't Hear About Amy's Singing Days (Week of 2/25)
description:
This edition of the podcast features behind the scenes from show members and moments that happened after we turned off the microphones. On this episode, Morgan2 brings on Amy to talk about her karaoke days and Lunchbox about how he taught his wife this week to drive stick shift!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
